import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaArrowRight, FaStar, FaTruck, FaShieldAlt, FaCreditCard, FaCog } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Home = () => { const features = [ { icon: , title: "Livraison Rapide", description: "Livraison gratuite pour toute commande supérieure à 50€" }, { icon: , title: "Paiement Sécurisé", description: "Vos données sont protégées par un cryptage SSL" }, { icon: , title: "Retours Faciles", description: "30 jours pour changer d'avis, retours gratuits" } ]; const categories = [ { name: "Hauts", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1441986300917-64674bd600d8?w=400", link: "/products?categorie=hauts" }, { name: "Bas", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1542272604-787c3835535d?w=400", link: "/products?categorie=bas" }, { name: "Robes", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1515372039744-b8f02a3ae446?w=400", link: "/products?categorie=robes" }, { name: "Vestes", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551028719-00167b16eac5?w=400", link: "/products?categorie=vestes" } ]; return (

Très satisfait !" }, { name: "Sophie M.", rating: 5, comment: "Une boutique en ligne fiable avec des produits tendance." } ].map((testimonial, index) => (
{[...Array(testimonial.rating)].map((_, i) => ( ))}

"{testimonial.comment}"

{testimonial.name}

))}

); }; export default Home;
